Title: GPT-5 is here, and it's now available in GitHub Copilot
Author: GitHub
Description:
OpenAI's most advanced model, GPT-5, is here. In this video, we cover its new capabilities, from advanced coding and visual perception to being more honest and less prone to hallucination. Best of all, it's now rolling out in public preview for all paid GitHub Copilot plans. See how to enable it and start using it today.

#GPT5 #OpenAI #GitHubCopilot
